rules.6x6: Place a digit from 1 to 6 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 2x3 outlined box. Some digits have been substituted by letters. All instances of the same letter must be substituted by the same digit and different letters must be substituted by different digits.
rules.9x9: Place a digit from 1 to 9 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 3x3 outlined box. Some digits have been substituted by letters. All instances of the same letter must be substituted by the same digit and different letters must be substituted by different digits.
